post_title: SOLD: low grade HOF Beckley & Willis portraits...
post_content:
Presentable copies of the Jake Beckley and Vic Willis portraits.  I suspect the Willis has color added, thus resulting in the AA designation.

SOLD. Payment via personal check, M.O., or PayPal "gift".  References available, just ask.  Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiation.  I'd also gladly trade them for beaterish commons I need.

Please PM if interested.  Thank you.

Other prewar cards including T206, T210, Ruth cards, and postcards:

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
